tool_description: Processes participant responses to appointment confirmations and updates appointment status accordingly.

appointment_id.description: ID of the appointment being responded to

participant_id.description: ID of the participant providing the response

response_type.description: Type of response: confirm, decline, reschedule, maybe

update_calendar.description: Whether to update calendar system with response

notify_organizer.description: Whether to notify appointment organizer of response

error_messages: Invalid response data: Provide valid JSON string for response_data parameter.
Unknown appointment: Appointment ID not found in system.
Unknown participant: Participant ID not associated with this appointment.
Invalid response type: Use confirm, decline, reschedule, or maybe for response_type.
Response already processed: This participant has already responded to this appointment.
Appointment expired: Cannot process responses for past appointments.
usage: Provide response_data (as JSON), appointment_id, participant_id, and response_type. Optionally set update_calendar and notify_organizer flags. Returns processed response status and any required follow-up actions.

processing_status.description: Status of response processing: processed, failed, duplicate

appointment_status.description: Updated appointment status after processing response

notification_sent.description: Whether organizer notification was sent successfully
